title: BoJack Horseman
description: Todd is a main character who explicitly comes out as asexual in season 4 and explores his asexuality throughout the series.

title: Koisenu Futari
description: Protagonist who identifies as aromantic asexual, navigating life and relationships while understanding her orientation.

title: Shadowhunters
description: A warlock who explicitly identifies as asexual and panromantic in the series.

title: The Originals
description: An original vampire whose portrayal and character traits suggest asexual representation, though not explicitly stated.

title: The Imperfects
description: A scientist who identifies as asexual, representing ace identity in a sci-fi setting.

title: Game of Thrones
description: The Master of Whisperers who shows no sexual or romantic interest throughout the series, often interpreted as asexual representation.

title: Perfect Harmony
description: A choir member who identifies as asexual in the show.

title: Hazbin Hotel
description: The Radio Demon, confirmed by creator to be asexual and aromantic, a powerful overlord in Hell.
